answer:
We recommend that you call Evergreen Community Health Centre at 604-872-2511 to see if that is possible. If not, your local pharmacy or family doctor may be able to provide some of the vaccines.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can I get my immunizations done at Evergreen Community Health Centre? I have an immunizations record but would like to update it for admission to JIBC for Paramedic schooling. I have a pdf that contains immunizations I require in order to apply to JIBC.
